Package GameOfLife

Class GOLInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameOfLife.GOLInfo
  • public class GOLInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    The GOLInfo class contains all of the vital information that is needed to run the actual simulation. This information is held in private variables that can be accessed or mutated if necessary.
